div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1255 Cilicia, 1957 Burial: c. 400 B.C. (Kraay) Contents: 1300+ AR Athens: c. 200 tetradr. Side: 15+ double-sigloi Celenderis: c. 1000 double-sigloi Mallus: 1 double-siglos Soli: 40+ double-sigloi Citium, Azbaal: 10+ double-sigloi Lapethus: 3 double-sigloi Paphus: 1 double-siglos Salamis: 1 double-siglos Unc. Cypriote mint: 1 double-siglos (as BMC pl. 19, 8) Disposition: Athens 2; Oxford 11; New York 9 (Celenderis 7 = SNGBerry 1256-7, 1259-63; Tarsus 2) BCH 1960, pp. 493-4 â€ Kraay, NC 1962, pp. 1-15, illus.
